reviews.name: L.E.I. - Girls' Kate Skinny Jeans
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter is 8 years old and is petite. She weighs 39 lbs and we have tried a lot of jeans and they were too baggy. Even the slim skinny jeans didn't fit. These fit perfect and we will be buying more. She is a perfect size 6 and will be needing the 6X soon. We are so happy to finally find something that fits her.
reviews.title: Great fit

reviews.name: L.E.I. - Girls' Kate Skinny Jeans
reviews.reviewText: The picture and description do not do these jeans justice! They are real cute with sparkles all through the material. Nicely made, good fit. Love the darker color. My granddaughter loves them, and she looks adorable in them!
reviews.title: Cutest Jeans Ever!

reviews.name: L.E.I. - Girls' Kate Skinny Jeans
reviews.reviewText: The material is stretchy and not tight fitting. My daughter loves them
reviews.title: These fit my daughter wonderully

reviews.name: L.E.I. - Girls' Kate Skinny Jeans
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved the look & fit but does not like glitter. I was disappointed that nowhere in the product description did they include such a detail that these jeans have a glitter sprinkled through the fabric (which, by the way, do tend to get on other clothes in the washing & drying process). I think they're adorable; my 12-year-old thinks they're too gaudy.
reviews.title: Great Product - Daughter Didn't Like the Glitter

reviews.name: L.E.I. - Girls' Kate Skinny Jeans
reviews.reviewText: These pants fit great. They have an adjustable waist so I think my daughter will be able to wear these for a long time. They were a bit long but I just used iron on hem to take them up. It will be easy to let them back out as she grows. They have cute designs on the pockets and are perfect with tall boots. Another good thing is they don't fit so low that underwear shows. Good price for pants to wear to school. It won't be too devastating if she gets paint or other bad stains on them.
reviews.title: Great fitting pants
